00045 #define SPH_RESOLUTION 120

00052 SHModel::SHModel(const std::string &filename, const std::string &directionsfilename, char displayMode)
00053 {
00054     m_model      = 0;
00055     m_interp     = 0;
00056     m_directions = 0;
00057 
00058     m_displayMode = displayMode;
00059 
00060     m_Y     = 0;
00061     m_Yori  = 0;
00062     m_P     = 0;
00063     m_Sharp = 0;
00064 
00065     m_reso = SPH_RESOLUTION;
00066 
00067     m_maxTheta = M_PI;
00068     m_pasTheta = m_maxTheta / (Real)m_reso;
00069 
00070     m_maxPhi = 2.0 * M_PI;
00071 //    m_maxPhi = M_PI;
00072     m_pasPhi = m_maxPhi / (Real)m_reso;
00073 
00074     m_4PI = 4. * M_PI;
00075     m_2PI = 2. * M_PI;
00076 
00077 
00078     // Reading files
00079     Sequence::Pointer model = this->readFiles(filename, directionsfilename);
00080 
00081     // Getting images sizes
00082     SequenceRegion smodelRegion = model->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00083 
00084     unsigned int xMax = smodelRegion.GetSize(0);
00085     unsigned int yMax = smodelRegion.GetSize(1);
00086     unsigned int zMax = smodelRegion.GetSize(2);
00087     unsigned int kMax = smodelRegion.GetSize(3);
00088 
00089 //    std::cout << "\tThere are " << kMax << " images of size ";
00090 //    std::cout << xMax << "x" << yMax << "x" << zMax << "." << std::endl;
00091 
00092 
00093     // Compute order
00094     Real discr = 2.25 - 2.*(1. - kMax);
00095     m_order    = -1.5 + std::sqrt(discr);
00096     m_R        = kMax;
00097 
00098 
00099 //    std::cout << "\tModel is at order " << m_order << "." << std::endl;
00100 
00101 
00102     // Generate directions following resolution
00103 //    std::cout << "\tGenerating directions (sampling resolution " << m_reso << "x" << m_reso << ")..." << std::flush;
00104     m_directions = new std::vector<Direction>;
00105 
00106     for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_reso+1; i++)
00107     {
00108         for(unsigned int j=0; j<m_reso; j++)
00109             m_directions->push_back(Direction(i*m_pasTheta,j*m_pasPhi));
00110     }
00111 //    for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_reso; i++)
00112 //    {
00113 //        for(unsigned int j=0; j<m_reso-1; j++)
00114 //            m_directions->push_back(Direction(i*m_pasTheta,j*m_pasPhi));
00115 //    }
00116 //    std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00117 
00118 
00119     // SH basis matrix
00120 //    std::cout << "\tSpherical harmonics basis matrix..." << std::flush;
00121     this->computeSHBasisMatrix();
00122     this->computeSHBasisOriMatrix();
00123 //    std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00124 
00125     // Compute Legendre matrix
00126 //    std::cout << "\tComputing Legendre matrix..." << std::flush;
00127     this->computeLegendreMatrix();
00128 //    std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00129 
00130     // Build sharp coefficients
00131 //    std::cout << "\tBuilding sharper ODF matrix..." << std::flush;
00132     this->buildSharperODFMatrix();
00133 //    std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00134 
00135 
00136     // Allocate space memory for the array of images
00137 //    std::cout << "\tAllocating space memory..." << std::flush;
00138     m_model  = new Image::Pointer[kMax];
00139     m_interp = new ImageInterpolator::Pointer[kMax];
00140 //    std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00141 
00142 
00143 //    std::cout << "\tPreparing and interpolating data..." << std::flush;
00144 
00145     // Define images region
00146     ImageRegion iRegion;
00147 
00148     Image::IndexType iIndex;
00149     iIndex[0] = 0; iIndex[1] = 0; iIndex[2] = 0;
00150     iRegion.SetIndex(iIndex);
00151 
00152     Image::SizeType iSize;
00153     iSize[0] = xMax; iSize[1] = yMax; iSize[2] = zMax;
00154     iRegion.SetSize(iSize);
00155 
00156 
00157     // Define sequence region
00158     SequenceRegion sRegion;
00159 
00160     Sequence::SizeType sSize;
00161     sSize[0] = xMax; sSize[1] = yMax;
00162     sSize[2] = zMax; sSize[3] = 1;
00163     sRegion.SetSize(sSize);
00164 
00165 
00166     // Spacing and origin
00167     Sequence::SpacingType spacing = model->GetSpacing();
00168     Sequence::PointType origin    = model->GetOrigin();
00169 
00170     Image::SpacingType ispacing;
00171     ispacing[0] = spacing[0]; ispacing[1] = spacing[1]; ispacing[2] = spacing[2];
00172     Image::PointType iorigin;
00173     iorigin[0] = origin[0]; iorigin[1] = origin[1]; iorigin[2] = origin[2];
00174 
00175     itk::Matrix<Real,3,3> dirMat;
00176     itk::Matrix<Real,4,4> iniMat = model->GetDirection();
00177 
00178     dirMat(0,0) = iniMat(0,0);
00179     dirMat(0,1) = iniMat(0,1);
00180     dirMat(0,2) = iniMat(0,2);
00181 
00182     dirMat(1,0) = iniMat(1,0);
00183     dirMat(1,1) = iniMat(1,1);
00184     dirMat(1,2) = iniMat(1,2);
00185 
00186     dirMat(2,0) = iniMat(2,0);
00187     dirMat(2,1) = iniMat(2,1);
00188     dirMat(2,2) = iniMat(2,2);
00189 
00190 
00191     // Put sequence in array of images
00192     for(unsigned int k=0; k<kMax; k++)
00193     {
00194         // Allocate space memory
00195         m_model[k] = Image::New();
00196         m_model[k]->SetRegions(iSize);
00197         m_model[k]->SetSpacing(ispacing);
00198         m_model[k]->SetOrigin(iorigin);
00199         m_model[k]->SetDirection(dirMat);
00200         m_model[k]->Allocate();
00201 
00202         // Define correct sequence region
00203         Sequence::IndexType sIndex;
00204         sIndex[0] = 0; sIndex[1] = 0;
00205         sIndex[2] = 0; sIndex[3] = k;
00206         sRegion.SetIndex(sIndex);
00207 
00208         // Define iterators
00209         SequenceIterator sIt(model, sRegion);
00210         ImageIterator iIt(m_model[k], iRegion);
00211 
00212         // Copy data
00213         for(sIt.GoToBegin(), iIt.GoToBegin(); !sIt.IsAtEnd() && !iIt.IsAtEnd(); ++sIt, ++iIt)
00214             iIt.Set(sIt.Get());
00215 
00216         // Define interpolator
00217         m_interp[k] = ImageInterpolator::New();
00218         m_interp[k]->SetInputImage(m_model[k]);
00219     } // for k
00220 
00221 //    std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00222 
00223 
00224 //    std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00225 }

00227 SHModel::SHModel(Sequence::Pointer model, std::vector<Direction> *originalDirections, char displayMode)
00228 {
00229     m_model      = 0;
00230     m_interp     = 0;
00231     m_directions = 0;
00232 
00233     m_Y     = 0;
00234     m_Yori  = 0;
00235     m_P     = 0;
00236     m_Sharp = 0;
00237 
00238     m_displayMode = displayMode;
00239 
00240     m_originalDirections = originalDirections;
00241 
00242 
00243     Display1(m_displayMode, std::cout << "Loading model..." << std::endl);
00244 
00245     m_reso = SPH_RESOLUTION;
00246 
00247     m_maxTheta = M_PI;
00248     m_pasTheta = m_maxTheta / (Real)m_reso;
00249 
00250     m_maxPhi = 2.0 * M_PI;
00251 //    m_maxPhi = M_PI;
00252     m_pasPhi = m_maxPhi / (Real)m_reso;
00253 
00254     m_4PI = 4. * M_PI;
00255     m_2PI = 2. * M_PI;
00256 
00257     // Getting images sizes
00258     SequenceRegion smodelRegion = model->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00259 
00260     unsigned int xMax = smodelRegion.GetSize(0);
00261     unsigned int yMax = smodelRegion.GetSize(1);
00262     unsigned int zMax = smodelRegion.GetSize(2);
00263     unsigned int kMax = smodelRegion.GetSize(3);
00264 
00265     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tThere are " << kMax << " images of size ");
00266     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << xMax << "x" << yMax << "x" << zMax << "." << std::endl);
00267 
00268 
00269     // Compute order
00270     Real discr = 2.25 - 2.*(1. - kMax);
00271     m_order    = -1.5 + std::sqrt(discr);
00272     m_R        = kMax;
00273 
00274 
00275     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tModel is at order " << m_order << "." << std::endl);
00276 
00277 
00278     // Generate directions following resolution
00279     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tGenerating directions (sampling resolution " << m_reso << "x" << m_reso << ")..." << std::flush);
00280     m_directions = new std::vector<Direction>;
00281 
00282     for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_reso+1; i++)
00283     {
00284         for(unsigned int j=0; j<m_reso; j++)
00285             m_directions->push_back(Direction(i*m_pasTheta,j*m_pasPhi));
00286     }
00287 //    for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_reso; i++)
00288 //    {
00289 //        for(unsigned int j=0; j<m_reso-1; j++)
00290 //            m_directions->push_back(Direction(i*m_pasTheta,j*m_pasPhi));
00291 //    }
00292     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00293 
00294 
00295     // SH basis matrix
00296     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tSpherical harmonics basis matrix..." << std::flush);
00297     this->computeSHBasisMatrix();
00298     this->computeSHBasisOriMatrix();
00299     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00300 
00301     // Compute Legendre matrix
00302     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tComputing Legendre matrix..." << std::flush);
00303     this->computeLegendreMatrix();
00304     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00305 
00306     // Build sharp coefficients
00307     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tBuilding sharper ODF matrix..." << std::flush);
00308     this->buildSharperODFMatrix();
00309     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00310 
00311 
00312     // Allocate space memory for the array of images
00313     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tAllocating space memory..." << std::flush);
00314     m_model  = new Image::Pointer[kMax];
00315     m_interp = new ImageInterpolator::Pointer[kMax];
00316     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00317 
00318 
00319     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tPreparing and interpolating data..." << std::flush);
00320 
00321     // Define images region
00322     ImageRegion iRegion;
00323 
00324     Image::IndexType iIndex;
00325     iIndex[0] = 0; iIndex[1] = 0; iIndex[2] = 0;
00326     iRegion.SetIndex(iIndex);
00327 
00328     Image::SizeType iSize;
00329     iSize[0] = xMax; iSize[1] = yMax; iSize[2] = zMax;
00330     iRegion.SetSize(iSize);
00331 
00332 
00333     // Define sequence region
00334     SequenceRegion sRegion;
00335 
00336     Sequence::SizeType sSize;
00337     sSize[0] = xMax; sSize[1] = yMax;
00338     sSize[2] = zMax; sSize[3] = 1;
00339     sRegion.SetSize(sSize);
00340 
00341 
00342     // Spacing and origin
00343     Sequence::SpacingType spacing = model->GetSpacing();
00344     Sequence::PointType origin    = model->GetOrigin();
00345 
00346     Image::SpacingType ispacing;
00347     ispacing[0] = spacing[0]; ispacing[1] = spacing[1]; ispacing[2] = spacing[2];
00348     Image::PointType iorigin;
00349     iorigin[0] = origin[0]; iorigin[1] = origin[1]; iorigin[2] = origin[2];
00350 
00351     itk::Matrix<Real,3,3> dirMat;
00352     itk::Matrix<Real,4,4> iniMat = model->GetDirection();
00353 
00354     dirMat(0,0) = iniMat(0,0);
00355     dirMat(0,1) = iniMat(0,1);
00356     dirMat(0,2) = iniMat(0,2);
00357 
00358     dirMat(1,0) = iniMat(1,0);
00359     dirMat(1,1) = iniMat(1,1);
00360     dirMat(1,2) = iniMat(1,2);
00361 
00362     dirMat(2,0) = iniMat(2,0);
00363     dirMat(2,1) = iniMat(2,1);
00364     dirMat(2,2) = iniMat(2,2);
00365 
00366 
00367     // Put sequence in array of images
00368     for(unsigned int k=0; k<kMax; k++)
00369     {
00370         // Allocate space memory
00371         m_model[k] = Image::New();
00372         m_model[k]->SetRegions(iSize);
00373         m_model[k]->SetSpacing(ispacing);
00374         m_model[k]->SetOrigin(iorigin);
00375         m_model[k]->SetDirection(dirMat);
00376         m_model[k]->Allocate();
00377 
00378         // Define correct sequence region
00379         Sequence::IndexType sIndex;
00380         sIndex[0] = 0; sIndex[1] = 0;
00381         sIndex[2] = 0; sIndex[3] = k;
00382         sRegion.SetIndex(sIndex);
00383 
00384         // Define iterators
00385         SequenceIterator sIt(model, sRegion);
00386         ImageIterator iIt(m_model[k], iRegion);
00387 
00388         // Copy data
00389         for(sIt.GoToBegin(), iIt.GoToBegin(); !sIt.IsAtEnd() && !iIt.IsAtEnd(); ++sIt, ++iIt)
00390             iIt.Set(sIt.Get());
00391 
00392         // Define interpolator
00393         m_interp[k] = ImageInterpolator::New();
00394         m_interp[k]->SetInputImage(m_model[k]);
00395     } // for k
00396 
00397     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00398 
00399 
00400     Display1(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00401 }
00402 
00403 Sequence::Pointer SHModel::readFiles(const std::string &filename, const std::string &directionsfilename)
00404 {
00405 //    std::cout << "Loading model file \"" << filename << "\"..." << std::endl;
00406 
00407     //
00408     // Read model file
00409     //
00410 
00411 //        std::cout << "\tReading model's file..." << std::flush;
00412         SequenceReader::Pointer reader = SequenceReader::New();
00413         reader->SetFileName(filename);
00414         reader->Update();
00415 //        std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00416 
00417     //
00418     // Read direction's file
00419     //
00420 
00421 //        std::cout << "\tReading gradient directions' file..." << std::flush;
00422 
00423         // Open file
00424         std::fstream dirFile(directionsfilename.c_str(), std::fstream::in);
00425 
00426         if(!dirFile.is_open())  // Unable to open file
00427         {
00428             std::cout << "Error: unable to read file !" << std::endl;
00429             exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00430         }
00431         else                           // File is open
00432         {
00433             m_originalDirections = new std::vector<Direction>;
00434 
00435             Real theta = 0, phi = 0;
00436 
00437             while((dirFile >> theta) && (dirFile >> phi))
00438                 m_originalDirections->push_back(Direction(theta,phi));
00439         }
00440 
00441         // Close file
00442         dirFile.close();
00443 
00444 //        std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00445 
00446 
00447 
00448     return reader->GetOutput();
00449 }
00450 
00451 SHModel::~SHModel()
00452 {
00453     delete[] m_interp;
00454     delete[] m_model;
00455 
00456     delete m_directions;
00457 
00458     delete m_Y;
00459     delete m_Yori;
00460     delete m_P;
00461     delete m_Sharp;
00462 }
00463 
00464 Real SHModel::signalAt(Direction u, Point p)
00465 {
00466     // Compute spherical harmonics basis matrix
00467     Matrix Y(1, m_R);
00468 
00469     unsigned int j = 0;
00470 
00471     for(unsigned int l=0; l<=m_order; l+=2)
00472     {
00473         Real coeff = std::sqrt((2.*l + 1.) / m_4PI);
00474 
00475         for(int m=-(int)l; m<=(int)l; m++)
00476             Y(0,j++) = coeff * SphericalHarmonics::computeBasis(u,l,m);
00477     } // for l
00478 
00479 
00480     // Evaluate signal at u
00481     Matrix C(m_R, 1);
00482 
00483     ImageInterpolator::ContinuousIndexType index;
00484     index[0] = p.x(); index[1] = p.y(); index[2] = p.z();
00485 
00486     for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_R; i++)
00487         C(i,0) = m_interp[i]->EvaluateAtContinuousIndex(index);
00488 
00489 
00490     return (Y * C)(0,0);
00491 }
00492 
00493 Matrix SHModel::signalAt(Point p)
00494 {
00495     assert(m_P);
00496     assert(m_Yori);
00497 
00498 
00499     Matrix &Y     = *m_Yori;
00500 
00501 
00502     // Evaluate Orientation Diffusion Function at each gradient direction
00503     Matrix C(m_R, 1);
00504 
00505     ImageInterpolator::ContinuousIndexType index;
00506     index[0] = p.x(); index[1] = p.y(); index[2] = p.z();
00507 
00508     for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_R; i++)
00509         C(i,0) = m_interp[i]->EvaluateAtContinuousIndex(index);
00510 
00511 
00512     return (Y * C);
00513 }
00514 
00515 Matrix SHModel::signalAt(Point p, std::vector<Direction> *g)
00516 {
00517     // Compute spherical harmonics basis matrix
00518     Matrix Y(g->size(), m_R);
00519 
00520     // Compute Y matrix
00521     Real _4PI  = 4.0 * M_PI;
00522 
00523     unsigned int j = 0;
00524 
00525     for(unsigned int u=0; u<g->size(); u++)
00526     {
00527         for(unsigned int l=0; l<=m_order; l+=2)
00528         {
00529             Real coef = std::sqrt((2.0*(Real)l + 1.0) / _4PI);
00530 
00531             for(int m=-(int)l; m<=(int)l; m++)
00532                 Y(u,j++) = coef * SphericalHarmonics::computeBasis(g->at(u), l, m);
00533         } // for l
00534 
00535         j = 0;
00536     } // for u
00537 
00538 
00539     // Evaluate Orientation Diffusion Function at each gradient direction
00540     Matrix C(m_R, 1);
00541 
00542     ImageInterpolator::ContinuousIndexType index;
00543     index[0] = p.x(); index[1] = p.y(); index[2] = p.z();
00544 
00545     for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_R; i++)
00546         C(i,0) = m_interp[i]->EvaluateAtContinuousIndex(index);
00547 
00548 
00549     return (Y * C);
00550 }
00551 
00552 Real SHModel::odfAt(Direction u, Point p)
00553 {
00554     assert(m_P);
00555     assert(m_Sharp);
00556 
00557 
00558     Matrix &P     = *m_P;
00559     Matrix &Sharp = *m_Sharp;
00560 
00561 
00562     // Compute spherical harmonics basis matrix
00563     Matrix Y(1, m_R);
00564 
00565     unsigned int j = 0;
00566 
00567     for(unsigned int l=0; l<=m_order; l+=2)
00568     {
00569         Real coeff = std::sqrt((2.*l + 1.) / m_4PI);
00570 
00571         for(int m=-(int)l; m<=(int)l; m++)
00572             Y(0,j++) = coeff * SphericalHarmonics::computeBasis(u,l,m);
00573     } // for l
00574 
00575 
00576     // Evaluate Orientation Diffusion Function at u
00577     Matrix C(m_R, 1);
00578 
00579     ImageInterpolator::ContinuousIndexType index;
00580     index[0] = p.x(); index[1] = p.y(); index[2] = p.z();
00581 
00582     for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_R; i++)
00583         C(i,0) = m_interp[i]->EvaluateAtContinuousIndex(index);
00584 
00585 
00586     return (Y * (P * (Sharp * C)))(0,0);
00587 //    return (Y * (P * C))(0,0);
00588 }
00589 
00590 Matrix SHModel::odfAt(Point p)
00591 {
00592     assert(m_P);
00593     assert(m_Y);
00594 
00595 
00596     Matrix &Y     = *m_Y;
00597     Matrix &P     = *m_P;
00598     Matrix &Sharp = *m_Sharp;
00599 
00600 
00601     // Evaluate Orientation Diffusion Function at each gradient direction
00602     Matrix C(m_R, 1);
00603 
00604     ImageInterpolator::ContinuousIndexType index;
00605     index[0] = p.x(); index[1] = p.y(); index[2] = p.z();
00606 
00607     for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_R; i++)
00608         C(i,0) = m_interp[i]->EvaluateAtContinuousIndex(index);
00609 
00610 
00611     return (Y * (P * (Sharp * C)));
00612 //    return (Y * (P * C));
00613 }
00614 
00615 Direction SHModel::getMaxDirectionAt(Point p)
00616 {
00617     Matrix Psi       = this->odfAt(p);
00618     Real max         = Psi(0,0);
00619     Direction maxDir = m_directions->at(0);
00620 
00621     for(unsigned int i=1; i<Psi.Rows(); i++)
00622     {
00623         if(Psi(i,0) > max)
00624         {
00625             max    = Psi(i,0);
00626             maxDir = m_directions->at(i);
00627         } // Psi(i,0) <= max
00628     } // for each sampled directions
00629 
00630     return maxDir;
00631 }
00632 
00633 std::vector<Direction> SHModel::getMaxDirectionsAt(Point p)
00634 {
00635     std::vector<Direction> maxima;
00636 
00637     // Get data (max and min values at this position)
00638     Matrix Psi = this->odfAt(p);
00639 
00640     Real min = Psi(0,0), max = Psi(0,0);
00641     for(unsigned int i=1; i<Psi.Rows(); i++)
00642     {
00643         if(min > Psi(i,0))
00644             min = Psi(i,0);
00645 
00646         if(max < Psi(i,0))
00647             max = Psi(i,0);
00648     }
00649 
00650     unsigned int thetaRes = m_reso+1;
00651     unsigned int phiRes   = m_reso;
00652 
00653 
00654     for(unsigned int i=1; i<thetaRes-1; i++)
00655     {
00656         for(unsigned int j=0; j<phiRes; j++)
00657         {
00658             Real odf1, odf2, odf3, odf4, odf5, odf6, odf7, odf8;
00659             Real odf = Psi(phiRes*i + j, 0);
00660 
00661             if(j == 0)
00662             {
00663                 odf1 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1)+(phiRes-1), 0);
00664                 odf2 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1)+j, 0);
00665                 odf3 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1)+(j+1), 0);
00666                 odf4 = Psi(phiRes*i+(phiRes-1), 0);
00667                 odf5 = Psi(phiRes*i+(j+1), 0);
00668                 odf6 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1)+(phiRes-1), 0);
00669                 odf7 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1)+j, 0);
00670                 odf8 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1)+(j+1), 0);
00671             }
00672             else if(j == phiRes-1)
00673             {
00674                 odf1 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1)+(j-1), 0);
00675                 odf2 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1)+j, 0);
00676                 odf3 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1)+(0), 0);
00677                 odf4 = Psi(phiRes*i+(j-1), 0);
00678                 odf5 = Psi(phiRes*i+(0), 0);
00679                 odf6 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1)+(j-1), 0);
00680                 odf7 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1)+j, 0);
00681                 odf8 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1)+(0), 0);
00682             }
00683             else // j != 0 && j != phiRes-1
00684             {
00685                 odf1 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1)+(j-1), 0);
00686                 odf2 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1)+j, 0);
00687                 odf3 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1)+(j+1), 0);
00688                 odf4 = Psi(phiRes*i+(j-1), 0);
00689                 odf5 = Psi(phiRes*i+(j+1), 0);
00690                 odf6 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1)+(j-1), 0);
00691                 odf7 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1)+j, 0);
00692                 odf8 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1)+(j+1), 0);
00693             }
00694 
00695             if(odf > odf1 && odf > odf2 && odf > odf3 && odf > odf4 && odf > odf5 && odf > odf6 && odf > odf7 && odf > odf8)
00696             {
00697                 if((Psi(phiRes*i+j,0)-min)/(max-min) > 0.9)
00698                     maxima.push_back(Direction(i*m_pasTheta,j*m_pasPhi));
00699             }
00700         } // for each phi
00701     } // for each theta
00702 
00703 //    unsigned int phiRes = m_reso-1;
00704 //    bool isGreater;
00705 //    unsigned int j;
00706 //
00707 //    // i=0
00708 //    isGreater = true;
00709 //    j = 0;
00710 //
00711 //    do
00712 //    {
00713 //        isGreater = ( Psi(phiRes + j,0) < Psi(0,0) );
00714 //        j++;
00715 //    } while(isGreater && j<phiRes);
00716 //
00717 //    if(isGreater)
00718 //    {
00719 //        if((Psi(0,0)-min)/(max-min) > MAXIMA_THRESHOLD)
00720 //        {
00721 //            maxima.push_back(Direction(0,0));
00722 //            maxima.push_back(Direction(M_PI,0));
00723 //        }
00724 //    }
00725 //
00744 //
00745 //    // j=0 & general case
00746 //    for(unsigned int i=1; i<m_reso-1; i++)
00747 //    {
00748 //        for(unsigned int j=0; j<phiRes; j++)
00749 //        {
00750 //            Real odf, odf1, odf2, odf3, odf4, odf5, odf6, odf7, odf8;
00751 //
00752 //            if(j == 0)
00753 //            {
00754 //                odf = Psi(phiRes*i,0);
00755 //
00756 //                odf1 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1),0);
00757 //                odf2 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1),0);
00758 //                odf3 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1) + (phiRes-1),0);
00759 //                odf4 = Psi(phiRes*i + (phiRes-1),0);
00760 //                odf5 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1) + (phiRes-1),0);
00761 //                odf6 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1) + 1,0);
00762 //                odf7 = Psi(phiRes*i + 1,0);
00763 //                odf8 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1) + 1,0);
00764 //            }
00765 //            else if(j == phiRes-1)
00766 //            {
00767 //                odf = Psi(phiRes*i,phiRes-1);
00768 //
00769 //                odf1 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1) + (phiRes-1),0);
00770 //                odf2 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1) + (phiRes-1),0);
00771 //                odf3 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1) + (phiRes-2),0);
00772 //                odf4 = Psi(phiRes*i + (phiRes-2),0);
00773 //                odf5 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1) + (phiRes-2),0);
00774 //                odf6 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1),0);
00775 //                odf7 = Psi(phiRes*i,0);
00776 //                odf8 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1),0);
00777 //            }
00778 //            else // general case
00779 //            {
00780 //                odf = Psi(phiRes*i + j,0);
00781 //
00782 //                odf1 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1) + (j+1),0);
00783 //                odf2 = Psi(phiRes*i + (j+1),0);
00784 //                odf3 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1) + (j+1),0);
00785 //                odf4 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1) + j,0);
00786 //                odf5 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1) + j,0);
00787 //                odf6 = Psi(phiRes*(i-1) + (j-1),0);
00788 //                odf7 = Psi(phiRes*i + (j-1),0);
00789 //                odf8 = Psi(phiRes*(i+1) + (j-1),0);
00790 //            }
00791 //
00792 //            if(odf > odf1 && odf > odf2 && odf > odf3 && odf > odf4 && odf > odf5 && odf > odf6 && odf > odf7 && odf > odf8)
00793 //            {
00794 //                if((Psi(phiRes*i,0)-min)/(max-min) > MAXIMA_THRESHOLD)
00795 //                {
00796 //                    Direction u(i*m_pasTheta,j*m_pasPhi);
00797 //                    Vector v = u.toVector();
00798 //
00799 //                    maxima.push_back(u);
00800 //                    maxima.push_back(Vector(-v.x(), -v.y(), -v.z()).toDirection());
00801 //                }
00802 //            }
00803 //        }
00804 //    }
00805 
00806 
00807     return maxima;
00808 }
00809 
00810 void SHModel::computeLegendreMatrix()
00811 {
00812     assert(!m_P);
00813 
00814     m_P = new Matrix(m_R, m_R);
00815 
00816     Matrix &P = *m_P;
00817 
00818     P.Fill(0);
00819 
00820 
00821     unsigned int j = 0;
00822 
00823     for(unsigned int l=0; l<=m_order; l+=2)
00824     {
00825         for(int m=-(int)l; m<=(int)l; m++)
00826         {
00827             P(j,j) = m_2PI * SphericalHarmonics::legendrePolynomialInZero(l);
00828             j++;
00829         } // for m
00830     } // for l
00831 
00832     #ifndef NDEBUG
00833         std::cerr << "P (" << P.Rows() << "x" << P.Cols() << ")" << std::endl;
00834         P.GetVnlMatrix().print(std::cerr);
00835         std::cerr << std::endl;
00836     #endif // NDEBUG
00837 }
00838 
00839 void SHModel::computeSHBasisMatrix()
00840 {
00841     assert(m_directions);
00842     assert(!m_Y);
00843 
00844 
00845     // Allocate memory space for Y matrix
00846     m_Y = new Matrix(m_directions->size(), m_R);
00847 
00848     Matrix &Y = *m_Y;
00849 
00850     // Compute Y matrix
00851     Real _4PI  = 4.0 * M_PI;
00852 
00853     unsigned int j = 0;
00854 
00855     for(unsigned int u=0; u<m_directions->size(); u++)
00856     {
00857         for(unsigned int l=0; l<=m_order; l+=2)
00858         {
00859             Real coef = std::sqrt((2.0*(Real)l + 1.0) / _4PI);
00860 
00861             for(int m=-(int)l; m<=(int)l; m++)
00862                 Y(u,j++) = coef * SphericalHarmonics::computeBasis(m_directions->at(u), l, m);
00863         } // for l
00864 
00865         j = 0;
00866     } // for u
00867 
00868     #ifndef NDEBUG
00869         std::cerr << "Y (" << Y.Rows() << "x" << Y.Cols() << ")" << std::endl;
00870         Y.GetVnlMatrix().print(std::cerr);
00871         std::cerr << std::endl;
00872     #endif // NDEBUG
00873 }
00874 
00875 void SHModel::computeSHBasisOriMatrix()
00876 {
00877     assert(m_originalDirections);
00878     assert(!m_Yori);
00879 
00880 
00881     // Allocate memory space for Y matrix
00882     m_Yori = new Matrix(m_originalDirections->size(), m_R);
00883 
00884     Matrix &Y = *m_Yori;
00885 
00886     // Compute Y matrix
00887     Real _4PI  = 4.0 * M_PI;
00888 
00889     unsigned int j = 0;
00890 
00891     for(unsigned int u=0; u<m_originalDirections->size(); u++)
00892     {
00893         for(unsigned int l=0; l<=m_order; l+=2)
00894         {
00895             Real coef = std::sqrt((2.0*(Real)l + 1.0) / _4PI);
00896 
00897             for(int m=-(int)l; m<=(int)l; m++)
00898                 Y(u,j++) = coef * SphericalHarmonics::computeBasis(m_originalDirections->at(u), l, m);
00899         } // for l
00900 
00901         j = 0;
00902     } // for u
00903 
00904     #ifndef NDEBUG
00905         std::cerr << "Y (" << Y.Rows() << "x" << Y.Cols() << ")" << std::endl;
00906         Y.GetVnlMatrix().print(std::cerr);
00907         std::cerr << std::endl;
00908     #endif // NDEBUG
00909 }
00910 
00911 void SHModel::buildSharperODFMatrix()
00912 {
00913     assert(!m_Sharp);
00914 
00915 
00916     m_Sharp = new Matrix(m_R,m_R);
00917 
00918     Matrix &Sharp = *m_Sharp;
00919 
00920     Sharp.Fill(0);
00921 
00922 
00923     // Parameters
00924     Real l1 = 1.0;
00925     Real l2 = 0.1;
00926     Real a  = 0.9; // 1 - l2 / l1
00927     Real b  = 1500.;
00928 
00929     // Pre-computed values
00930     Real sqrta = std::sqrt(a);
00931     Real pre1 = std::asin(sqrta);
00932     Real pre2 = std::sqrt(0.1) * sqrta; // sqrt(1-a) * sqrt(a)
00933     Real coeff = 4. * b * std::sqrt(l1*l2);
00934 
00935     // Coefficients
00936     Real A0, A2, A4, A6, A8;
00937 
00938     if(m_order >=0)
00939         A0 = 1./(std::pow(a,0.5)) * 2. * pre1;
00940 
00941     if(m_order >= 2)
00942         A2 = -1./(2.*std::pow(a,1.5)) * ( (-3.+2.*a)*pre1 + 3.*pre2 );
00943 
00944     if(m_order >= 4)
00945         A4 = 1./(32.*std::pow(a,2.5)) * ( (105.-120.*a+24.*std::pow(a,2.))*pre1 + (-105.+50.*a)*pre2 );
00946 
00947     if(m_order >= 6)
00948         A6 = -1./(128.*std::pow(a,3.5)) * ( (-1155.+1890.*a-840.*std::pow(a,2.)+80.*std::pow(a,3.))*pre1 + (1155.-1120.*a+196.*std::pow(a,2.))*pre2 );
00949 
00950     if(m_order >= 8)
00951         A8 = 1./(8192.* std::pow(a,4.5)) *
00952             ( (225225.-480480.*a+332640.* std::pow(a,2.)-80640.* std::pow(a,3.)+4480.* std::pow(a,4.))*pre1 +
00953             (-225225.+330330.*a-132440.* std::pow(a,2.)+12176.* std::pow(a,3.))*pre2 );
00954 
00955 
00956     // Compute sharper coefficients in a diagonal matrix
00957     if(m_R >= 1)
00958         Sharp(0,0) = coeff/A0;
00959 
00960     if(m_R >= 6)
00961     {
00962         for(unsigned int i=1; i<6; i++)
00963             Sharp(i,i) = coeff/A2;
00964     }
00965 
00966     if(m_R >= 15)
00967     {
00968         for(unsigned int i=6; i<15; i++)
00969             Sharp(i,i) = coeff/A4;
00970     }
00971 
00972     if(m_R >= 28)
00973     {
00974         for(unsigned int i=15; i<28; i++)
00975             Sharp(i,i) = coeff/A6;
00976     }
00977 
00978     if(m_R >= 45)
00979     {
00980         for(unsigned int i=28; i<45; i++)
00981             Sharp(i,i) = coeff/A8;
00982     }
00983 
00984     #ifndef NDEBUG
00985         std::cerr << "Sharp (" << Sharp.Rows() << "x" << Sharp.Cols() << ")" << std::endl;
00986         Sharp.GetVnlMatrix().print(std::cerr);
00987         std::cerr << std::endl;
00988     #endif // NDEBUG
00989 }
00990 
00991 } // namespace btk
